price: "Do perdão de meu Senhor para mim, e de que me fez dos honrados."
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
